## AuthProvider interface

Interface that represents an auth provider, used to facilitate creating [AuthCredential](./auth-types.authcredential.md#authcredential-class)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface AuthProvider 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [providerId](./auth-types.authprovider.md#authproviderproviderid-property) | string | Provider for which credentials can be constructed. |

Provider for which credentials can be constructed.

<b>Signature:</b>
